programme.title: Loin du Paradis
programme.desc:
(2) U.S. 2002. In 1950s Connecticut, a housewife faces a marital crisis and mounting racial tensions in the outside world.
Réalisation : T. Haynes Todd Haynes
Avec : Julianne Moore Dennis Quaid Dennis Haysbert Patricia Clarkson Viola Davis James Rebhorn

programme.title: What Happened to Holly Bartlett
programme.desc: In March 2010, 31-year-old blind graduate student Holly Bartlett was found beneath Halifax's MacKay Bridge. Police ruled her death a day later an accident. Eight years later, a private investigator reopens the case.

programme.title: The Other Ordinary
programme.desc: The Other Ordinary spotlights eight Canadians, and their director, who are the only professional, travelling theatre group made up of people of all abilities.

programme.title: Loin du Paradis
programme.desc:
(2) U.S. 2002. In 1950s Connecticut, a housewife faces a marital crisis and mounting racial tensions in the outside world.

programme.title: AMI This Week
programme.desc: Halifax apprentice Jillian Gillis reports from the Annapolis Valley on Farm Safety Nova Scotia's new "We Talk. We Grow." campaign, which promotes mental health and wellness for everyone working in agriculture.

programme.title: AMI This Week
programme.desc: (S10EP35) Jillian Gillis discovers what it takes to be a puppy raiser and how it impacts the CNIB Guide Dog program. Then, Grant Hardy chats with partially sighted artist Violet Peterson about her work and advocacy.

programme.title: Ça me regarde
programme.desc: (S09EP35) Aujourd'hui, on plonge dans la production théâtrale Soeurs Sirène, qui met en vedette un personnage handicapé. Et nous débutons l'émission avec la découverte d'un concept qui place les patients au coeur des recherches sur les maladies chroniques.

programme.title: Rendez-vous politique surprise
programme.desc:
Andrea Khanjin, Conservative MPP, and Jennifer McKelvie, Toronto City Councillor, review the Ontario government's environmental record and discuss what needs to be done to help preserve green spaces in Toronto and around Ontario.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Dillon's life was altered at just eighteen when he was diagnosed with Friedreich's Ataxia, a rare genetic disease. Walking is difficult, and his speech is impaired - but Dillon has taken his disability as an opportunity to try new activities.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
(S18EP15) Josh Davies is a stand-up comedian trying to turn making people laugh into a full time living. It's not an easy path, but being Blind gives Josh a unique perspective.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Postcards From ...
programme.desc:
Go north, young man! Alex Smyth heeds that advice and travels to where Canada's history started: Northern Ontario. Alex explores Moosonee and Moose Factory, where the Hudson Bay Company established their first fur trading post.
Année : 2011

programme.desc:

programme.title: The Awakeners
programme.desc:
(S01EP01) Indigenous singer Laura Vinson shares her heart and personal queries that led her on a quest to find Indigenous artists who are disabled.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Kiesha's Story
programme.desc:
Follow Kiesha, who is a vibrant 24-year-old incomplete quadriplegic focused on regaining her strength and retraining her muscle memory as she empowers herself to access health care services in Alberta.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Jared Flitcroft is a filmmaker, businessman, family man, and he is Deaf. Overcoming barriers to achieve success in the film industry, Jared hopes for a future with NZSL used more widely.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Eighteen year old OJ lost his sister to Cystic Fibrosis ; a genetic lung condition he has also inherited. Every breath is a challenge for OJ, but with whanau support he's making each one count.
Année : 2011

programme.title: L'autre versant de la montagne
programme.desc:
(4) U.S. 1975. The true life story of a champion skier whose dreams are dashed after an accident that leaves her paralyzed.
Année : 2011
Réalisation : L. Peerce
Avec : Marilyn Hassett Beau Bridges Belinda Montgomery

programme.title: Disrupt
programme.desc:
(S01EP02) In this episode of Disrupt, hosted by Taylor Olson, we introduce you to drag artists, an artist who is Deaf, a poet and a musician.
Année : 2023

programme.desc:
(S04EP17) Join Dave Brown as he discusses the latest news, entertainment, sports and current events through a disability lens.
Année : 2023

programme.title: Best of Kelly and Ramya
programme.desc:
(S01EP17) Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.
Année : 2023

programme.title: Son of a Critch
programme.desc:
(S01EP10) The Critch men are left to their own devices after Mary is hospitalized for a minor procedure. Mark has trouble balancing the household chores and accidentally gives Pops the wrong pills.
Année : 2022

programme.title: Mr.D
programme.desc:
(S08EP02) When Gerry's officially introduced as Xavier's new principal, the staff's visible disappointment leads Gerry to try and gain their trust by making some drastic moves he thinks everyone can appreciate.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
